Name: LDH
Text: ID 1001-1100 (Extra Story)

Name: Kamui
Text: Wait, why did the evolution even change the species?

Name: Chrome
Text: This is going to be bad... Kamui!

Name: Kamui
Text: Alright, just leave it to me.

Name: LDH
Text: ID 2001-2100 (2.8 Main Story Stage 3)
<size=60>Day <color=#FF0000>97</color></size>
(Whistles)

Name: Andre:
Text: Oh, sorry.

Name: Daniel
Text: Quiet, Captain is still sleeping!

Name: Andre:
Text: You haven't slept much ever since we were surrounded by the Corrupted attracted over by the explosion.

Name: Daniel
Text: Not many Corrupted ahead. We can evacuate through the subway station.

Name: Andre:
Text: The half-month siege is finally going to end.

Name: Joyce
Text: Watanabe, can we finally get out?

Name: Watanabe
Text: Not many Corrupted ahead. Now's the best chance.

Name: Joyce
Text: Great... Great...
Great... Hmm... Stop making noises, stomach...

Name: Joyce
Text: Try to hold it. Didn't I just give you your last rations yesterday?

Name: Andre:
Text: It's fine. You can have mine... I've got nothing left as well...

Name: Daniel
Text: You...

Name: Watanabe
Text: It's fine. Take it.
T-thank you... Watanabe!

Name: Watanabe
Text: Let's go. Cover the civilian retreat.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Fight the enemies! Protect the citizens!
Had I made that choice, would it have changed my future...?
Andre: "Captain will not leave us behind! Hang on!"
Zong: "Watanabe... Where are you...?"
Daniel: "It seems this is the end..."
...Will you give up on everyone just to survive?

Name: Illusion:
Text: I didn't expect you to make such choice.

Name: Illusion:
Text: Just take it as the inside of a mirror.

Name: Illusion:
Text: It doesn't matter. And it's not the right time.

Name: Illusion:
Text: But, this is not what you're trying to run away from, right?
City 57 Campsite\n2022-08-25
City 57 Evacuation Point\n2022-08-25
Buzz... Buzz... Buzz...

Name: Andre:
Text: We're safe for now.

Name: Daniel
Text: Just need to evacuate from the subway station.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Stay sharp!

Name: Andre:
Text: A large Corrupted... Let's distract it!

Name: Daniel
Text: Captain, you go with the citizens first!

Name: Joyce
Text: Watanabe... Help your teammates... The Corrupted seems hard to deal with...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Which way should I go...?

Name: Illusion:
Text: You know how it will end. Why can't you accept it but keep repeating it?

Name: Daniel
Text: This is the end...? We've bought enough time, right?

Name: Andre:
Text: Bring it on!

Name: Watanabe
Text: Here I am!

Name: Andre:
Text: Captain?!

Name: Illusion:
Text: Wanna run away? You won't get anything if you do.

Name: Daniel
Text: Careful, Captain. Pay attention to your state.

Name: Andre:
Text: You monster! I'll make sure you die!

Name: Andre:
Text: I knew we could always count on you, Captain.

Name: Daniel
Text: Captain... Sigh...
It still happened.
The Corrupted came out of nowhere and stormed that place. We couldn't save them.

Name: Illusion:
Text: Sometimes you just can't be in two places at once.

Name: Illusion:
Text: Still gonna do this? Must be really lucky to be on your team.

Name: Illusion:
Text: I know how you feel. This is quite common.

Name: Illusion:
Text: Most of them have become regrets forever.

Name: Illusion:
Text: But as a soldier, you have already desecrated their determination and your duty.

Name: Illusion:
Text: Of course... there's another choice.

Name: Illusion:
Text: You know how it will end. Why can't you accept it but keep repeating it?

Name: Joyce
Text: Hide behind me!
Watanabe!

Name: Watanabe
Text: Leave it to me!

Name: Joyce
Text: Thank you... Thank you... Sob...

Name: Andre:
Text: Don't sleep! Damn it! Wake up! Why can't you just wake up?

Name: Daniel
Text: Ha... Then just whistle. Your whistling always wakes people up, right?

Name: Andre:
Text: You...

Name: Daniel
Text: Captain... We've bought enough time, right...?
(Explosions)

Name: Illusion:
Text: They died with dignity.

Name: Illusion:
Text: I used to wonder what is more important. Life or duty?

Name: Illusion:
Text: Choose again if you're still hesitating.

Name: Illusion:
Text: Like I said. You can't change how it ends.

Name: Illusion:
Text: Their deaths were predestined.

Name: Illusion:
Text: The thing is... Will it become your shadow or motivation?

Name: Illusion:
Text: You know how it will end. Why can't you accept it but keep repeating it?

Name: Illusion:
Text: Keep trying. Keep failing.

Name: Illusion:
Text: Heh... You ended up picking the most irrational path...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Come here!

Name: Watanabe
Text: I alone am enough.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Bring it on! I can do this all day!

Name: Watanabe
Text: Am I dying?

Name: Illusion:
Text: To some extent, yes.

Name: Watanabe
Text: How are they?

Name: Illusion:
Text: Does it matter?

Name: Watanabe
Text: At least it proves that my death will be meaningful.

Name: Illusion:
Text: Sometimes, things don't change due to individual will.

Name: Illusion:
Text: We always dream of sacrificing ourselves for the best result and end up proving that we're just ridiculously arrogant.

Name: Illusion:
Text: Life holds many regrets. Sometimes we have to accept it.

Name: Illusion:
Text: Our own will is small, but people who are affected by it could change the future.

Name: Watanabe
Text: You guys...

Name: Daniel
Text: Don't blame yourself, Captain. There's no way to find a perfect ending among a bunch of bad choices.

Name: Andre:
Text: How could we leave you behind when you choose to stay, Captain?

Name: Joyce
Text: Watanabe... Thank you for saving that kid. I believe that kid will grow up to be a good adult under your influence...

Name: Watanabe
Text: ...Time to face the reality...
Avoiding choices doesn't solve anything.
Especially under these circumstances.

Name: Illusion:
Text: Choose.

Name: Illusion:
Text: Your ending.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Still doesn't work...?

Name: Watanabe
Text: Hmm...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Cough...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Weird...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Seems a bit...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Ambush!

Name: LDH
Text: ID 3001-3100 (2.8 Main Story Stage 7)

Name: Zong:
Text: Aargh!!!

Name: Soldier:
Text: He's weird! Gotta be something wrong with him!

Name: Watanabe
Text: You...

Name: Soldier:
Text: Ha, I knew you were here!

Name: Watanabe
Text: Zong, go to the basement. I'll take care of this.

Name: Soldier:
Text: Kill him for Generalissimo!

Name: Watanabe
Text: I happen to have something to ask you.

Name: Soldier:
Text: You should be in hell already!

Name: Watanabe
Text: Like I expected...

Name: Soldier:
Text: Split up in threes! Don't let him get us all!

Name: Zong:
Text: Don't worry, Commandant. They can't defeat Watanabe.

Name: Watanabe
Text: I happen to have something to ask you.

Name: Squad Leader:
Text: You think killing several minions will make you invincible?

Name: Squad Leader:
Text: Guess you've used up your energy!

Name: Watanabe
Text: You woke up? It's okay to sleep a bit longer.

Name: Watanabe
Text: I'll go check it out.

Name: Commandant:
Text: Careful!

Name: Zong:
Text: Watanabe!

Name: Watanabe
Text: Time to move.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Can you still move?

Name: Watanabe
Text: Let me go check again. Wait for my signal. He probably hasn't stopped yet.
Abandoned Bar\n10:00

Name: LDH
Text: 2.12 Escape Stage

Name: Bridget:
Text: Cough cough, this place is collapsing. I have to go up now...

Name: Bridget:
Text: Uhhh! The road is blocked. Need to find another way.

Name: Bridget:
Text: It's locked.

Name: Bridget:
Text: Open... Now...

Name: Bridget:
Text: Okay. It's open!

Name: Bridget:
Text: A piece of cake.

Name: Bridget:
Text: There's no time. Climb up this cable.

Name: Bridget:
Text: Almost there.

Name: Bridget:
Text: Tsk, the door is stuck.

Name: Bridget:
Text: The fire door is locked by the security system. Have to unlock it in the central control room with permissions.

Name: Bridget:
Text: The security system was hit by the falling stones. Have to restore the power. Should be similar to how we fixed the circuit earlier.

Name: Bridget:
Text: Nice, the fire door is open!

Name: Bridget
Text: The gate has not moved at all
Central Control Room\nCamera: 01\nBackup Code: *********

Name: Karenina:
Text: The place is collapsing. 5 o'clock, hurry! Teddy will help you open the door over there.

Name: Karenina:
Text: You'll have to jump over. There's no other shortcut... Hey, are you alright?

Name: Karenina:
Text: Teddy! What's with this stupid route?!

Name: Teddy:
Text: It's the shortest one I can find! If you can get through, then it's good!

Name: Karenina:
Text: Don't worry, Teddy has already hacked into the Central Control Room. You just need to connect the power.

Name: LDH
Text: 2.12 Boss Stage

Name: Bridget:
Text: The yellow light's special attacks cannot be dodged. Avoid the area.

Name: Skych:
Text: Are you able to take this?

Name: Bridget:
Text: No! Can't take this hit directly! Have to move out of his range of attack!

Name: Skych:
Text: Rest peacefully in the tomb.

Name: Skych:
Text: I will set up a tombstone for you with all my respect.

Name: Skych:
Text: What is it... that keeps you going? Why can't you just give up?

Name: LDH
Text: 2.15 Boss Stage

Name: Lucia
Text: Even though we share the same enemy, the future we seek is different.

Name: Lucia
Text: I will never let you build your plans upon our sacrifices!

Name: Lucia
Text: No matter the price, I will keep my oath!

Name: Lucia
Text: He's reversed time! ...And the Hetero Tower is helping him?!

Name: Lucia
Text: We're... back at square one?

Name: Lucia
Text: (Sigh)

Name: Lucia
Text: It's time to end this!

Name: Lucia
Text: There is no avoiding this "longer path".

Name: Lucia
Text: Someone has to stay behind...!

Name: Vonnegut
Text: Our destination should have been the same.

Name: Vonnegut
Text: We meet again. How many times has it been now?

Name: Vonnegut
Text: After countless failures, I devised this plan. Yes, it will demand sacrifices, but if not for it, the consequences will be far more devastating.

Name: Vonnegut
Text: Instead of a plan guaranteed to succeed, you chose to gamble on another possibility?

Name: Vonnegut
Text: Go to the original Hetero Tower of "Chaos" and see for yourselves the consequences of Agent Zero going haywire.

Name: LDH
Text: 2.15 Pursuit and Escape

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, I've already activated the access permissions. Just take the elevator down from the underground parking lot.

Name: Lucia
Text: Stay close to me.

Name: Lucia
Text: She can even do that now?

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: Cradle's following us!

Name: Lucia
Text: Fall back immediately! We need to get to the Hetero Tower!

Name: Cradle
Text: That connection has indeed weakened my authority, but she isn't ready yet—and your "key" is about to run out.

Name: Lucia
Text: This way, Commandant!

Name: Cradle
Text: Let's have another dance, shall we?

Name: Lucia
Text: Stay in my sight, Commandant!

Name: Lucia
Text: She's blocking our path... If we keep on like this...

Name: 【kuroname】:
Text: Chaos... thank you.

Name: Cradle
Text: So you've finally decided to show yourself, Chaos.

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, this way!

Name: Cradle
Text: Well, let's see how much more you can take.

Name: Cradle
Text: This is my latest composition. Care to give it a listen?

Name: Lucia
Text: Another Hetero-Creature!

Name: Cradle
Text: You executed your plan too soon. It would take at least ten more cycles of interference before I may possibly lose my ability to resist.

Name: Cradle
Text: Why not wait a little longer? Oh, right—you couldn't afford it anymore.

Name: Lucia
Text: Is this also part of your deal with Chaos? Commandant...

Name: Cradle
Text: ...There's my cue.

Name: Lucia
Text: Almost there!

Name: Cradle
Text: In the end, the dying shepard stumbles back into the sheep pen, but is too weak to fend off the ever-present packs of "wolves"—does that count as leading wolves to the house?

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant! Enter the code! Same numbers as last time. I'll cover you!

Name: Lucia
Text: Can't remember, Commandant? The code is 973654.

Name: Lucia
Text: We're through! Let's go!

Name: Lucia
Text: She's following us! You go first!

Name: Cradle
Text: Succumb to my Red Tide. I'll preserve you... forever.

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant?!

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: Chaos?

Name: Lucia
Text: Ugh...! I'm fine, I can keep going!

Name: Lucia
Text: Let Commandant go!

Name: Lucia
Text: Thanks.

Name: Lucia
Text: I'm sorry... I should have protected you better...

Name: Lucia
Text: Don't worry. I'm fine.

Name: Lucia
Text: Let me go, Cradle!

Name: Cradle
Text: Guess we're ending it all with you.

Name: Lucia
Text: Cradle!!!

<size=40><color=#000000>...</color></size><size=60><color=#FF0000>Run</color><color=#000000>...</color><color=#FF0000>Get out</color><color=#000000>...</color><color=#FF0000>of here</color><color=#000000>...</color></size><size=40><color=#000000>...</color></size>
<size=40><color=#000000>No...</color></size><size=60><color=#FF0000>The experiment</color></size><size=40><color=#000000>...</color></size>
<size=40><color=#000000>Has the anomaly been cleared? Hmm...</color></size>

Name: Ishmael
Text: Sigh...

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: What's this place...? Where am I...

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: Leave... this place? No, why am I running...?

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: Ugh! How, how is this possible... Hetero-Creature?!

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: A new form I've never seen before...

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: This place is dangerous. I must get out of here first...

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: This way's no good...

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: I can't die here...

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: Hetero-Creature...

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: The sound of... seawater?

Name: Unknown Voice
Text: Huh? How did a (test subject) get here?...

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: Who's there?!

Name: Unknown Voice
Text: An infected (experiment)...
When you throw a new variable into an old story, something interesting always happens.
I love seeing these little changes pop up.
Now... let's see...
After adding this "variable", will this story... find a different voice?

Name: Narration
Text: A human... has wandered into an unknown world.

Name: Narration
Text: They stand up...

Name: Narration
Text: Hmm... looks like they don't remember anything, and decide to explore ahead.

Name: Narration
Text: They don't seem to notice the ground, just walk through the passage and leave.

Name: Narration
Text: These bodies that are almost identical to them... are all lifeless. They're confused...

Name: Narration
Text: Oh... it's Red Tide Projection. It always manages to hold onto some unexpected "data".

Name: Lithos
Text: Loki's head is severely damaged, her consciousness data couldn't be saved.

Name: Researcher
Text: Sorry, we've tried everything we could...

Name: Lithos
Text: Then... we'll need to try another way...

Name: Narration
Text: They seem to have received some interesting information from the Red Tide Projection... is it about "Lithos" or "Loki"?

Name: Narration
Text: They don't seem interested in this place, and quickly leave the Red Tide area.

Name: Narration
Text: Why are they still here? They seem to want more information, but this is all the projection contains.

Name: Narration
Text: Around the corner, they see another Red Tide Projection... what new data does this one hold?

Name: Lithos
Text: I'm sorry, sir... I've lost the Gray Raven Commandant's exact location, and Cthylla went berserk from being awakened early.

Name: Shorthalt
Text: We're stuck! There's nothing but those monsters from earlier back there.

Name: Shorthalt
Text: Commandant, we need to get rid of her here! She's going to join Lithos and have us cornered if we let her get away now!

Name: Lithos
Text: Are you the Commandant the Gray Raven team is desperately searching for? Or just one of the five they don't care about?

Name: Narration
Text: The Red Tide Projection fades, and they seem to notice marks on the ground...

Name: Narration
Text: They're still not interested in what happened here... Really not going to take a look?

Name: Narration
Text: Oh, they found the bloodstains... yes, those are traces left from the "last" anomaly.

Name: Narration
Text: They're sure they're on the right path, and decide to keep going.

Name: Narration
Text: Huh? They didn't notice the bloodstains on the ground? I think they should check it out... why not?

Name: Narration
Text: Oh, they're a very stubborn human... but maybe that's why they can...

Name: Narration
Text: They found the path and seem eager to leave this place...

Name: Narration
Text: They're spacing out... what are they thinking? Hoping for more information, or thinking about something else?

Name: Narration
Text: This place is like a huge maze to them, and they're trying to find their way across.

Name: Narration
Text: They realize it's the wrong way.

Name: Narration
Text: Hmm... why insist on going down this wrong path?

Name: Narration
Text: I think they should leave here and find the right path.

Name: Narration
Text: They're still waiting... waiting for a miracle? But waiting won't make miracles happen.

Name: Narration
Text: They seem to have decided to leave, hmm... I think that's the right decision.

Name: Narration
Text: Alright, I can't guess their intentions. They seem determined to leave here.

Name: Narration
Text: It's a new fork in the road, and they choose... the path down.

Name: Narration
Text: Hmm... is my memory failing? The way out should be down there, but maybe... they have their own ideas.

Name: Narration
Text: Going this way, they'll soon reach the real exit.

Name: Narration
Text: Oh, a new Red Tide Projection.

Name: Lithos
Text: Infected experiment... just destroy it.

Name: Narration
Text: "Infected experiment"... do they realize that refers to them? Looks like they need to leave quickly.

Name: Narration
Text: Hmm... they don't seem interested in this Red Tide Projection either.
They still stepped onto that final path...

Name: Narration
Text: Huh? What's this... They seem to have found something.

Name: Narration
Text: This is a new route... They're not familiar with it. Maybe they should go back and head towards the real exit below.

Name: Narration
Text: They seem to want to try a new route.

Name: Narration
Text: Unfortunately, their decision is wrong. Maybe they should go back and try another path.

Name: Narration
Text: Are they still waiting? But there are no more stories here.

Name: Narration
Text: Hmm... is it a new "anomaly"? Looks like something interesting is about to happen...

Name: Narration
Text: They saw everything.

Name: Narration
Text: It's them... I think now... is not the time for them to be here.

Name: Shorthalt
Text: I remember Valeria gave me a whole pack, over a hundred pills, but I only remember eating two, and giving you one.

Name: Noan
Text: Agree to this deal, help Cthylla's womb break free, and protect the Commandant while leaving.

Name: Noan
Text: Give me the egg, only then can I suppress Cthylla from the inside, and use her protection to help you withstand the water pressure 5,000 meters below the deep sea.

Name: Lithos
Text: Once the last injection is finished, you'll only have 48 hours left to live. Even if you get back to the Babylonia immediately, they might not have the technology to save you.
Red Tide Projection... can record...
If... if you can see this...

Name: The Merciful One
Text: Sorry... leave this place... It is not... the right time for you to be here.

Name: The Merciful One
Text: You shouldn't be here yet... it's not time, Gray Raven...

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: A decorative stand with a slot where something could be inserted.

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: A door opens.

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: The stand has strangely-shaped slots that might trigger some mechanism.

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: Its shape resembles a key, perhaps it can be placed somewhere.

Name: Narration
Text: Where do they want to go?

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: Uh... where is this place...

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: It's a bit early. Better wait here for a moment.

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: This feeling...

Name: Ishmael
Text: "Gray Raven", I'm coming... "Gray Raven"!
Body scan results... just asleep?
"Gray Raven"... wake up...

Name: Ishmael
Text: You're awake. If the portable scanner hadn't shown nothing was wrong, I'd have taken you to medical.

Name: Ishmael
Text: It's okay.

Name: Ishmael
Text: You looked really uncomfortable just now. Did you have a bad dream?

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: Can't remember. Just that I was running, and then you showed up.

Name: Ishmael
Text: You seem preoccupied lately. Can you tell me what's on your mind?

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: If... you realized you were stuck in an endless loop, what would you do?

Name: Ishmael
Text: Are you there too?

Name: Ishmael
Text: As long as you're there, that's all that matters.

Name: Ishmael
Text: Hungry? I made some food.

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: Sorry, this is a terrible date.

Name: Ishmael
Text: Just make it up next time.

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: Has it really been... this long?

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: Maybe...

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: Thank you...

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: I'd like to take a photo of you... as a keepsake.

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: This is where you and Ishmael agreed to meet yesterday.

Name: Selena
Text: Dandelion, do you read me? Have you spotted the target?

Name: Dandelion
Text: N-not yet. I'm in the lounge on the right side. It's crowded here and I'm still looking... uh, sorry.

Name: Selena
Text: In that case, stick to the plan and check the room on the left.

Name: Selena
Text: The security system here is as sensitive as ever.

Name: Selena
Text: Dandelion, what's the situation on your end?

Name: Dandelion
Text: There seems to have been some commotion just now. Security personnel are trying to calm everyone down, and some of the corridors have been closed off.

Name: Selena
Text: Looks like we'll need to find another route.

Name: Selena
Text: Breaking through wouldn't be difficult, but it would cause a bigger commotion. Better to proceed with caution.

Name: Selena
Text: Dandelion is responsible for the area ahead. Time is limited, so let's prioritize other locations first.

Name: Selena
Text: No response... Has the security system locked it down completely?

Name: Selena
Text: The device here still seems to be operational.

Name: Selena
Text: This theater is a maze. If something goes wrong, guests can't easily escape.

Name: Selena
Text: Something doesn't seem right... Is that Lueya? I should confirm.

Name: Selena
Text: The placement of these objects seems a bit strange.

Name: Selena
Text: The posture of this plaster figure has been clearly distorted.

Name: Selena
Text: Pages are missing from the books here.

Name: Selena
Text: That doesn't seem right. Perhaps I should look around for more clues.

Name: Selena
Text: The sheet music is severely damaged, but it looks restorable.

Name: Selena
Text: Whew... that felt like a good performance.

Name: Selena
Text: Leave it to me.

Name: Selena
Text: Hmm... That should do it.

Name: Selena
Text: Jonathan... and Dandelion's here too.

Name: Jonathan
Text: ...W-what is that?!

Name: Selena
Text: She's here! Dandelion, take Jonathan and go!

Name: Dandelion
Text: R-right! Got it!

Name: Selena
Text: I need to get to the second floor quickly. Is there anything... Ah, the lift from earlier!

Name: Selena
Text: I can't afford to linger here too long.

Name: Selena
Text: Dandelion, meet me at the exit.
Required item missing
<color=#e8f5ff>Operation Theater</color>

Name: Enora Lueya
Text: Your dance partners are all gone, Iris. Do you intend to perform the curtain call alone? Then you'll be the only one leaving the stage.
<color=#e8f5ff>Homecoming</color>

Name: Selena
Text: The structure is completely identical... An area-wide rewind, perhaps... Or maybe...

Name: Selena
Text: The lever is locked in place. Has the security system been restored as well?

Name: Selena
Text: Hmm... Looks like the door's jammed from the other side.

Name: Selena
Text: All the levers are disabled. I need to find the control center.

Name: Selena
Text: Some kind of audio recorder... All the notes are damaged. Do I need to play the corresponding melody?

Name: Selena
Text: I recognize this song.

Name: Selena
Text: Thankfully, my skills haven't grown rusty.

Name: Selena
Text: The control center should be this way.

Name: Selena
Text: Additional defenses... Looks like I'm heading in the right direction.

Name: Selena
Text: Strange... This decor feels more like a club. What's she hiding?

Name: Selena
Text: What's this? A hidden room...

Name: Selena
Text: The device is working properly. Looks like this is the place.

Name: Selena
Text: Should be all set now. I should head back to where I started.

Name: Selena
Text: It's working properly now.

Name: Selena
Text: I'd like to have a more ceremonious opening, you know.

Name: Enora Lueya
Text: You always come up with solutions quickly when encountering theater accidents... Good. That's what makes a proper artist.

Name: Selena
Text: Lueya, what's done is done.

Name: Enora Lueya
Text: That's what you think... Iris. This is not over yet.

Name: Enora Lueya
Text: Ah... So that's how it is... Hah... I'll come for you again... Iris...
<color=#e8f5ff>Medium Points</color>
3.6 Rematch with Von

Name: Lucia
Text: Vonnegut!

Name: Vonnegut
Text: You're fully aware of what I'm doing.

Name: Lucia
Text: That's exactly why we have to stop you.

Name: Vonnegut
Text: ...Just as I thought, there's never a convenient shortcut...

Name: Vonnegut
Text: Every problem still has to be solved one by one.

Name: Lucia
Text: What...?!

Name: Liv
Text: What's that...?!

Name: Vonnegut
Text: Lucia... do you remember now?

Name: Vonnegut
Text: Partings in life and farewells in death, existence and demise...

Name: Vonnegut
Text: Even so, you still choose to charge ahead?

Name: Lucia
Text: Whatever Commandant expects... that's what I'll strive for with everything I have!

Name: Lucia
Text: How...

Name: Vonnegut
Text: For this... is my domain.

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: Lucia, wake up! This... must not be our end!

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: Lucia, we need to keep moving forward together...

Name: Lucia
Text: —Commandant!

Name: Vonnegut
Text: ...Impossible.

Name: Lee & Liv
Text: Lucia—!

Name: Vonnegut
Text: ...In the end, there's no other way but force.

Name: Vonnegut
Text: Only the victors shall live to see... how this world ends.

Name: Lucia
Text: Like I said, whatever Commandant expects... that's what I'll strive for with everything I have!

Name: Vonnegut
Text: After all... this ending was...
Lucia... Hurry... Enter the domain...
3.6 Boss Challenge

Name: Bianca
Text: ...We are finally there.

Name: Bianca
Text: The end of the passage... To think a place like this is hidden here...

Name: Bianca
Text: Wait, this place...

Name: Bianca
Text: ...Whoever you are, show yourself!

Name: Chiko
Text: Captain... Bianca.

Name: Bianca
Text: ...Chiko?

Name: Chiko
Text: Captain... I'm sorry.

Name: Bianca
Text: ...I never imagined this would be our reunion...

Name: Chiko
Text: Please... just laugh at me.

Name: Bianca
Text: No... I could never do that.

Name: Bianca
Text: I will carry on your will and keep moving forward...

Name: Bianca
Text: Bianca, Captain of the Purifying Force.

Name: Bianca
Text: Beginning extermination.
...She probably knew about her death long before it happened. It's just...
Maybe this is the ending she wanted all along...
<color=#e8f5ff>Her Farewell</color>
3.6 Defend Luna

Name: Lamia
Text: Ah...! Those monsters are closing in on Luna!

Name: Lamia
Text: Eek! C-careful, those weird things with a shield are coming!

Name: Lamia
Text: Eeek, those monsters look really tough. Please don't notice me...

Name: Alpha
Text: Futile.

Name: Roland
Text: Let the show begin!

Name: Alpha
Text: Luna's hurt. This is not good.

Name: Roland
Text: Oh my, attacking the princess directly like that? How rude!

Name: Alpha
Text: Luna!

Name: Roland
Text: Oh no, Luna!

Name: Luna
Text: Ugh...

Name: Selene
Text: Luna... Let's start this over, Luna. You should become the key, and I will take you... to the pinnacle of the Ascension-Network.

Name: Luna
Text: Hmph...

Name: Selene
Text: Is this the power that keeps you going?

Name: Selene
Text: Ugh... damn it...

Name: Luna
Text: Too weak.

Name: Luna
Text: Now... witness true power!
Roland's weapons deal bonus armor-piercing DMG to shielded Hetero-Creatures and can execute them.
Alpha deals massive DMG and can effectively eliminate unshielded Corrupted.

Name: Luna Current HP
Text: <color=#d6502b>{0}%</color>

Name: Luna Current HP
Text: <color=#d6502b>40%</color>

Name: Luna Current HP
Text: <color=#d6502b>30%</color>

Name: Luna Current HP
Text: <color=#d6502b>20%</color>

Name: Luna Current HP
Text: <color=#d6502b>10%</color>

Name: Luna Current HP
Text: <color=#d6502b>5%</color>

Name: Luna Current HP
Text: <color=#d6502b>1%</color>
Luna has not fully absorbed the power. Beginning Force Overclock. Combat effectiveness is expected to decrease significantly.
4.0 Stage 1

Name: Liv
Text: They... seem to be over there.

Name: Liv
Text: Something's wrong in this area...

Name: Liv
Text: I hear movement...

Name: Liv
Text: There's a vehicle over there... Is it from the conservation area?

Name: Liv
Text: It has the conservation area logo, but... no one's here.

Name: Liv
Text: Scan complete. No other Hetero-Creatures nearby...

Name: Liv
Text: Ahem, it's fine. Probably just my new frame adjusting. Visual module recalibrating—

Name: Liv
Text: Calibration complete. Let's keep moving, Commandant...

Name: Liv
Text: Wait, more Hetero-Creatures? How...?

Name: Liv
Text: ...It's okay, Commandant. Must be a small fault in my visual module.

Name: Liv
Text: —Visual module calibration complete.

Name: Liv
Text: No one around this vehicle... Let's check it for information.
4.0 Stage 2

Name: Liv
Text: This road should lead to the lab ahead, Commandant.

Name: Liv
Text: It's a hover platform from the mine... It's still working. We can ride it up.

Name: Liv
Text: This gap is too narrow... Maybe I can use the frame's special ability to get through...

Name: Liv
Text: ...So this is the lab inside the mine?

Name: Liv
Text: Watch out!

Name: Liv
Text: It's the lab's defense system... Must be running on backup power.

Name: Liv
Text: Those projections... are they recorders? What were they meant to capture?

Name: Liv
Text: These look like scattered research notes... There might be more clues about this lab nearby. Let's take a look around, Commandant.

Name: Liv
Text: Those marks... were they caused by an explosion?

Name: Liv
Text: These leftover supplies... some of them should still be usable.

Name: Liv
Text: ...Looks like a resting camp left by the squad. Commandant, let's take a break.

Name: Liv
Text: Let's explore the area, Commandant. From what we've found so far, we need to locate the lab's power source...

Name: Liv
Text: These people... were they lab staff?

Name: Liv
Text: No, they don't look it. More like... residents from the conservation area.

Name: Liv
Text: Are these... traces left by the Rodent Squad?

Name: Liv
Text: How could this happen... What really went on here?

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant, here's the lab's power source! Let's switch it on and restore power to this area.

Name: Liv
Text: Let's rest here for a bit, Commandant.

Name: Liv
Text: This person... something's wrong. It's like they're being controlled, like a puppet…
I'm sorry... but without these supplies, we... we'll all die.
Food. I need food. Food, food, food, food, food... MY food!
Heh, I have to survive...
You obtained a weapon: Cyan Blossom
